meanings.definition: More characteristic of or resembling the backwoods.
meanings.sent1: The cabin in the woods looked even backwoodsier with the overgrown vines.
meanings.sent2: The old pickup truck seemed even backwoodsier with its rusted exterior.
meanings.sent3: The backwoodsier setting made the camping trip feel like a true adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her rustic attire made her blend into the backwoodsier surroundings effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The smell of pine trees and campfire smoke made the backwoodsier atmosphere come alive.

meanings.sent1: He spoke backwoodsier than anyone else in the small town.
meanings.sent2: The locals greeted each other backwoodsier than city dwellers.
meanings.sent3: The city slicker tried to imitate the backwoodsier way of chopping wood.
meanings.sent4: She danced backwoodsier than anyone at the country hoedown.
meanings.sent5: The old man moved backwoodsier as he navigated the forest trail with ease.
